casebody.data:
99-0589 (La. 4/23/99)

Chandell HARDY and Steve Hardy, individually, on Behalf of their Minor Daughter, Mariah Ashley Hardy v. EASY T.V. AND APPLIANCE RENTAL OF LOUISIANA, INC., et al. No. 99-C-0589. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Hardy, Chandell; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Orleans Civil District Court Div. “I” Number 96-11445; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98CA-1239

Denied.

LEMMON, J. not on panel.
